original_title: Ouaga! Hommage à l'homme du 4 aout
overview: An expressionist reflection on a country's future. The 'l'homme du 4 aout' is former President Sankara, the 'African Che Guevara' who changed the name of Upper Volta on 4 August 1984 to Burkina Faso. His Marxist mission failed, the country is still searching.
title: Ouaga! Hommage à l'homme du 4 aout
